subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish of the Rangers, a friend and rival of the injured Masahiro Tanaka, said he believed that six-man rotations could relieve the stress on pitchers.
snippet: Yu Darvish of the Rangers, a friend and rival of the injured Masahiro Tanaka, said he believed that six-man rotations could relieve the stress on pitchers.
